title: Science Teacher Competency Development Program for Flipped Learning and Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational educational methodologies and science subject matter knowledge
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service teachers to develop flipped learning class design and implementation competencies using smartphones. Integrates science curriculum technology based on the TPACK framework.

learning_goals: Can design flipped learning materials for science subjects using smartphone-based digital content creation tools
Can analyze integration points of science content, pedagogy, and technology using the TPACK framework
Can resolve technical issues arising during flipped learning implementation through collaboration with peer teachers

resources: Science Subject Open Educational Resources (OER) Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
